alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 05 at 10:15AM CDT until April 07 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier. * WHEN...From this morning to Friday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:59 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 4.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:59 AM CDT Wednesday was 4.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage through Thursday night. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Calcasieu River Salt Water Barrie 4.0 4.1 Wed 5 am CDT 3.9 3.8 3.8 &&
